author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
At Dark, I Become Loathsome is the echoing refrain that creeps through Eric LaRocca’s latest novel like a vine seeking you out, intent to pull you down into the undergrowth. In a tribute to grief, loss, self-loathing, identity and desire, LaRocca has written a darkly emotive story that looks to bring out some harsh realities […]

The post REVIEW: At Dark, I Become Loathsome by Eric LaRocca appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: At Dark, I Become Loathsome by Eric LaRocca
